Package controller

Class MainMenuController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainMenuController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainMenuController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
FXML Controller class This class controls the main menu page, while contains other functions such as adding, modifying part and adding, modifying product. It also contains an exit button.

    • ToAddPart

      public void ToAddPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      When the add button is clicked for Part Table view, it takes you to add part screen. The add part screen is launched so user can put in details to add a part.
      Parameters:

    • ToAddProduct

    • ToDeletePart

      public void ToDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      When the part delete button is clicked, a confirmation will be asked to make sure user really wants to delete part. It will then remove the part from the part array list and reprint the data to the table view without the deleted part.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • ToDeleteProduct

      public void ToDeleteProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      method to delete a product when it is clicked by the user. Will confirm with the user if the user really wants to delete the product.
      Parameters:
      event - of type ActionEvent

    • ToModifyPart

      public void ToModifyPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      When modify part button is clicked then the user is taken to new screen where they can modify a part that is clicked.
      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • resultsSearchPart

      public void resultsSearchPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is used when the user searches for a part. It will print part to screen if it is available based on part name or part id.
      Parameters:
      event -

    • resultsSearchProducts

      public void resultsSearchProducts(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
